== Marketing ==

Welcome to the '''Lubuntu''' marketing gallery. Please, take care, if you want to use the SVG sources, you may need the <nowiki>[[http://font.ubuntu.com/ | Ubuntu typeface]]</nowiki> (shipped with '''Lubuntu''') to avoid a graphical disaster :). If you're looking for the official '''Lubuntu''' artwork, it's <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork|here]]</nowiki>. If you would like to know about Lenny, the Lubuntu mascot, go <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Marketing-Lenny|here]]</nowiki>. For Press Releases head <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Marketing-Press Releases|here]]</nowiki>.
<<BR>><<BR>>

=== Colour palette ===

You can download the Lubuntu <nowiki>[[attachment:lubuntu_palette.gpl|palette]]</nowiki> file. Put the file on the folder "~/.gimp-2.8/palettes" for using with GIMP 2.8, or in "~/.inkscape/palettes" for using with Inkscape.

Light blue: '''RGB''' 0, 104, 200 / '''CMYK''' 100, 48, 0, 22 / '''Hex''' #0068C8<<BR>>
Dark blue:  '''RGB''' 3, 60, 113 / '''CMYK''' 97, 47, 0, 56 / '''Hex''' #033C71<<BR>>
Ultramarine: '''RGB''' 0, 24, 44 / '''CMYK'''  100, 45, 0, 83 / '''Hex''' #00182C

<nowiki>[[File:lubuntu_palette_wide.png]]</nowiki>

=== AskLubuntu ===

<nowiki>[[File:ask_lubuntu.png]]</nowiki>

You can use a quick link to the portal AskUbuntu for enabling your readers a direct access to Lubuntu specific questions. Use this image and pace the following link to head over:

http://askubuntu.com/questions/tagged/lubuntu
